CELTA - Certificate in Teaching English to Speakers of Other LanguagesThe most widely recognised pre-service qualification in the world for teachers of English to speakers of other languages. Grammar FundamentalsThese workshops help you prepare for the CELTA course but can help proficient English users develop their understanding of its grammar.
